body.name: Instant Solo Single Serve Coffee Maker, From the Makers of Instant Pot, K-Cup Pod Compatible Coffee Brewer, Includes Bold Setting and 40oz. Water Reservoir, Brew 8 to 12oz., Black
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Tech210.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 20 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 20 mins.
features: PRE-INFUSION BREW PROCESS: Gently soaks grounds before brewing to produce a deeper, more aromatic/flavorful cup of coffee. Compatible with K-Cups and most other coffee pods.

POUR OVER ICED COFFEE: Use the BOLD feature to create the perfect pour over iced coffee. Fill your glass with ice cubes and select BOLD and 8, 10 or 12oz. Option to add your choice of milk to finish off your perfect iced coffee.
FASTER BREWING: Brew your single serve of hot coffee in just 90 seconds with an option of 3 different brewing sizes - 8oz, 10oz, or 12oz cup
LARGE REMOVABLE WATER RESERVOIR: Brew more, refill less with the 40oz removable reservoir. It's also dishwasher safe, so no more descaling water reservoirs

EASY-TO-USE INTERACTIVE INTERFACE & SOUND NOTIFICATIONS: Delivers intuitive control by using key sounds to alert the user during the entire brewing process while the flat-touch sensor buttons give you effortless control.
COMPACT DESIGN: Measuring at 11.8 x 5.3 x 12.6 in, this single serve coffee maker packs a powerful punch, but takes up minimum counter space!
REMOVABLE DRIP TRAY: Included removable dishwasher safe drip tray that allows you to fit up to a 7"/16oz. travel mug.

INTANT CAFÉ EXPERIENCE: Enhance your coffee experience with Compostable Instant Coffee Pods, and our Instant Frother allowing you to create café style lattes and cappuccinos in the comfort of your home.
DISCOVER AMAZING COFFEE RECIPES: Includes the free Instant Brands Connect App, where you can find new recipes to create quick coffee favorites and prepare delicious meals, available iOS and Android.
body.description: Brewing a great cup of coffee at home is easy with the Solo Single-Serve 2-in-1 Coffee Maker. It can handle both K-Cup pods and your own grounds in a reusable pod. When placed in the Instant Solo, the reusable pod activates a unique brewingsequence that extracts more flavor, aroma and body from your favorite ground coffee. Choose from multiple brew sizes with 8, 10 or 12 oz cups, and adjust the brewing strength to make it as bold as you like. The 40oz reservoir means you can refill less frequently, and the removable drip tray lets you fill up to a 7" tall 16oz travel mug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brews the best pod coffee we’ve ever had. Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Nice small footprint on your counter top. Truly brews a good strong cup of coffee if you so desire. All that is great but what’s truly great is customer service. After a month or so ours went south while making the mornings second cup of coffee. Reached out to customer support and got a very quick response with several trouble shooting suggestions. When those failed they got immediately back and after supplying them with a couple pieces of requested info, a brand new unit was shipped to me. You don’t get that kind of service just anywhere. We are forever fans for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent little coffee pot
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing little coffee pot. Although it only brews 8,10 & 12oz at a time. It works perfectly for us. Made well. Easy to use and it doesn’t take up a lot of space on my counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Lasted 2 days short of one month!
reviews.reviewText: Loved the size, shape, easily gleanability of this coffeemaker. Fast, tasty coffee. The problem is that it now flashes lights, makes a funny noise, and sprays water and steam out the top where you put in the k-cup. Reading other people's comments, those not 5-star, instead of a replacement I want my money back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Love all the instant pot products. . I bought this maker to replace a 1 year old keurig duo, which is a huge coffee maker. I didn’t want to hear my husband’s nay saying so I left it in the car, pending the appropriate time to sneak it in the house. As luck would have it, I was cleaning up the keurig and it would not pump up water. I tried everything in the world to get the keurig to work but alas, it would not. Luckily, this instant pot coffee maker was still sitting in my car, Ready for action.It makes a great cup of coffee. Absolutely adore the BOLD option.I don’t think I’ll go back to a keurig. The keurig was my third pot in about 4 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars get this instead of a single serve keurig
reviews.reviewText: I bought a single serve Keurig in September of 2023. By January the coffee temperature was warm but not hot. I have been buying Keurig coffee pots for a number of years but they have been going down hill. This coffee pot makes hot coffee and also has a reservoir that holds 40 oz but still has the same footprint as the Keurig. You can choose from 8, 10 and 12 oz servings. I can use my refillable filters and pods. So far, I am very pleased with this coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Price Was Just Right
reviews.reviewText: I'm glad we decided to purchase this coffee maker. It is so easy to use and the price was just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ho water missiles!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this due to the current reviews at the time. I waited before submitting mine. I love the size and the features, however when my husband was making my coffee(he’s amazing), he said “be careful the coffee machine is spraying hot water when brewing”. Because I’m low vision, legally blind I need to be especially careful with how I handle appliances so when I made coffee I felt like I was being hit with hot water missiles. NOT GOOD. My back Kerrigan which is showing signs of retirement after 2 years is still trustworthy. I went back and ordered another Kerrigan with the feature now added called “strong”, which I take to mean “bold brew”. This goes back to dangerous for the disabled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used to be great coffee pot - poor delivery broke after 1 week of use
reviews.reviewText: Love this coffee pot so when my current one broke after 4 years I ordered a new one. It was delivered yesterday in a box that looked like it was opened and resealed. When I opened the product box, again it looked like it was opened and clumsily repackaged. It didn’t look like it was used so I set it up and ran a cleaning cycle as directed. Still worked this morning so we will keep it. It should have never been sent out that way! Update: broke after 1 week of use.
